title: CEL Policy Evaluation Middleware Config
description: Configuration for the CEL policy evaluation middleware plugin. Evaluates inline CEL expressions against request context for access control decisions.

expression.description: CEL expression that must evaluate to a boolean. Has access to a `request` object with fields: method, path, query, headers, body, client_ip, path_params, consumer, claims.

deny_message.description: Custom message returned in the 403 Forbidden response body when the expression evaluates to false.
